See if you should cash those savings bonds now or hold them until maturity.
  1. First, input all of your bonds through the US Treasury Department here.
  2. Then click the 'View' button on that page.
  3. On the new page, select from the first "Serial #" all the way to the last "Note" and copy it.
  4. Paste the information in the below textarea.
  5. Input your current tax rate and your future tax rate.
  6. Press GO and find out if you should cash or hold that bond!

Disclaimer: This tool gives a very rough ball park based on the current value and interest rates. It is impossible to determine the exact final value of an EE savings bond due to some of the bonds having a variable interest rate that changes every 6 months. It also does not take into account things like inflation, other debts or investments you have, etc. Do not use this as a primary means of making financial decisions.
